name: S.M.O.L.
description:
S.M.O.L. is a third-person puzzle shooter where you find yourself in an abandoned facility where only you and your fellow robots remain. 
 

You play as the S.M.O.L. unit - released from your holding cell, with no people in white coats to be found. You come across the prototype magnetic gun... conveniently placed on a pedestal outside your cell. There seemed to be some signs around, and something on the gun itself that looked like text... but you can’t read. You disregard them and pick up the gun.

With the power of magnets, you can push and drag objects, including yourself, to fantastic results. Using this, you can solve puzzles like connecting power plugs, pulling heavy leavers, and moving platforms. 
But solving puzzles isn't the only problem for S.M.O.L.. Other robots want to stop you from leaving the facility, Turret spiders shooting stunning rounds at you, mover robots trying to knock you out before you can escape...Use the magnet gun and your computing powers to finally leave. 

Solve the puzzles and defeat robots trying to stop you! And find a way out of the research facility!
